summary: Implementation successfully covers all major requirements with comprehensive dark mode UI, financial calculator, legal defense generator, PDF export functionality, and dashboard. All acceptance criteria appear to be addressed in the implementation.

hallucinated_features.description: User profile management system with name and email fields
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not mention user profiles, account creation, or profile management. The implementation includes UserProfile type, ProfileSetup component, and profile-related backend functions (getCallerUserProfile, saveCallerUserProfile) that were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Gallery images storage and management functionality
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request gallery or image storage features. The backend includes galleryImages storage map and GalleryImage type definition that were not part of the requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Admin access control and authorization system
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not specify admin roles, access control levels, or authorization systems. Implementation includes AccessControl initialization, MixinAuthorization, admin token handling, and permission checks throughout.
